thread.title: Connecticut senator says Congress inaction 'responsible' for school schootings

title: Connecticut senator says Congress inaction 'responsible' for school schootings
text:
Connecticut senator says Congress inaction 'responsible' for school schootings 6:27am IST - 01:47 
Connecticut Senator and Democrat Chris Murphy highlighted the shooting at a Florida high school on the Senate floor Wednesday and said Congress is 'responsible' for the shooting because of inaction by Congress. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Connecticut Senator and Democrat Chris Murphy highlighted the shooting at a Florida high school on the Senate floor Wednesday and said Congress is 'responsible' for the shooting because of inaction by Congress.
